#### Basics

Create local .aws folder under user for example that has credential information

```bash
# IN C:\Users\fan\.aws
# config file
[default]
region = us-east-1
output = json
# credentials file
[default]
aws_access_key_id = XKIXXXGSXXXBZXX43XXX
aws_secret_access_key = xxTgp9r0f4XXXXXXX1XXlG1vTy07wydxXXXXXX11
```
